hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#git clone git://git.eclipse.org/gitroot/tmf/org.eclipse.xtext.git org.eclipse.xtext.git cd ${WORKSPACE} rm -rf buildroot xtext.* javadoc output deployment mkdir buildroot mkdir output : COMPACT_BUILD_ID="${BUILD_ID//[-_]}" COMPACT_BUILD_ID="${COMPACT_BUILD_ID:0:12}" : { cat "${WORKSPACE}/org.eclipse.xtext.git/releng/org.eclipse.xtext.releng/releng/xtext-build.properties" echo echo "# Define the Build ID (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "build.id=N${COMPACT_BUILD_ID}"
echo echo "# Define the timestamp to use for changed components (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "buckminster.build.timestamp=${BUILD_ID}"
echo echo "# Define the Build Alias (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "build.alias=${BUILD_ALIAS}"
echo echo "# Define Hudson Build ID (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "hudson.build.id=${BUILD_ID}"
echo echo "# Override default locations (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "buckminster.output.root=${WORKSPACE}/buildroot/buckminster.build" echo "buckminster.temp.root=${WORKSPACE}/buildroot/buckminster.temp" echo "eclipse.staging.area=/shared/download-staging.priv/modeling/tmf/xtext"
echo echo "# Sign the jars (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "site.signing=false" } > buildroot/build.properties : { echo "# Define the Build ID to use for tagging (added by Hudson job definition)" echo "build.id=${COMPACT_BUILD_ID}"
} > buildroot/tagging.properties : { echo "file_export_version=3.0" echo "/instance/org.eclipse.pde.api.tools/INVALID_REFERENCE_IN_SYSTEM_LIBRARIES=Ignore" echo "/instance/org.eclipse.pde.api.tools/missing_default_api_profile=Ignore" echo "\!/="
} > buildroot/api-check-to-warn.epf :

hudson.plugins.buckminster.EclipseBuckmi.commands:
setpref targetPlatformPath="${WORKSPACE}/buildroot/target.platform" importprefs -F buildroot/api-check-to-warn.epf import -Declipse.download="http://download.eclipse.org/" "${checkout.location}/releng/org.eclipse.xtext.releng/releng/xtext-platform.mspec"
resolve "${checkout.location}/releng/org.eclipse.xtext.releng/releng/xtext.cquery"
build
